function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increasing the numbers of air exchanges","Impact":"Incomplete removal of harmful contaminants, leading to the potential spread of infectious agents.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of ventilation systems, maintenance of air filters, and ensuring continuous operation of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filtration systems, real-time air quality monitoring systems, and demand control ventilation technologies.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone spending time in the workplace.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, and employers."},{"Description":"Avoiding air recirculation","Impact":"Accumulation of contaminated air and potential spread of infectious agents within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, periodic cleaning and disinfection of ventilation systems, and avoiding air recirculation in areas with high occupancy.","Technologies":"HEPA filtration systems, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation systems, and negative pressure ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants of the building, maintenance staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, and maintenance personnel."}]}
